title: Dropped an entire Division after placements
body: So last season i was gold 1, after going 5 for 5 in my placements i have dropped to silver 1..... I'm pretty salty, just looking for info whether this is normal or what really cuz.... A WHOLE DIVISION

replies.body:
You will always get lower then where you were last season unless there is some freaky anomaly.

Season 4 I ended Silver 2. Went 7-3 in placements and got Silver 4. Even if you go 10-0 you would have ended up 1 or 2 divisions down. So going 5-5 dropping 5 divisions isn't a surprise.

Be thankful for the new "promo helper". You should be gold in no time.
I've already won one and lost one and after seeing this........ Bronze 5 here I come
10/10 and bronze V im so fckn happy right now   {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Well I went 9/1 and got demoted 2 ranks
If you win like 8 you will be placed near your last seasons rank. Losing 5 is pretty bad.

There's some info on it here: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-ranked-season-kicks-soon

Relevant part for you is this: "Preseason brought some substantial changes to the game (learn more about preseason here, so we’re again running a soft reset before placements kick off. As with previous years because of the soft reset, you’ll likely place lower than where you ended last year."
